Test Name: CHEESE, MOLD, IgE, SERUM analytical testing
Specimen Type: Cheese samples, mold swab/air/surface samples, serum (from blood)
Purpose: To perform analytical testing and generate accurate, reliable results for cheese, mold, IgE, and serum specimens.
Container: Sterile containers for cheese and mold specimens; serum-separator (SST) or red-top tubes for blood/serum
Equipment: Incubators and culture media, microscope, PCR thermocycler, ELISA plate reader, chemiluminescent immunoassay analyzer
